allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$content = Get-Content ''index.php'' -Raw; $pattern = ''\(?s\)    <!-- LAB_SECTION_REMOVED -->.*?    <!-- END LAB SECTION -->\\r?\\n''; $content = $content -replace $pattern, ''''; Set-Content -Path ''index.php'' -Value $content -NoNewline")
Bash(php -r "$f=''index.php''; $c=file_get_contents\($f\); $c=preg_replace\(''/\\s*<!-- LAB_SECTION_REMOVED -->.*?<!-- END LAB SECTION -->\\s*/s'', ""\\n\\n"", $c\); file_put_contents\($f, $c\);")
